scripts.build: docusaurus build && npm run embed-download && npm run embed-copy && npm run branding-download && npm run branding-copy && npm run status-download
scripts.embed-download: git clone --single-branch --branch gh-pages https://github.com/stethoscope-js/embed && rm -rf embed/.git
scripts.status-download: git clone --single-branch --branch gh-pages https://github.com/stethoscope-js/status && rm -rf status/.git
